metadata.description: Context building for Claude Code with knowledge base - A marketplace of Claude Code components for contextual knowledge retrieval

mcp-servers.name: basic-memory
mcp-servers.description: Knowledge base storage and retrieval for C4 model documentation

plugins.name: abstractor-agent
plugins.description: Deep architectural analysis of existing codebases through autonomous subagent-driven exploration - produces comprehensive documentation, C4 diagrams, and subsystem catalogs

plugins.name: basic-memory
plugins.description: Knowledge management system via MCP - create, search, and sync knowledge notes across projects with multi-project support and real-time synchronization

plugins.name: melly-validation
plugins.description: Centralized validation scripts and templates for Melly C4 workflow - 7 production-ready validators (init, c1-c3 systems, markdown) and 3 markdown generators with 2,859 lines of code

plugins.name: c4model-c1
plugins.description: C4 Model Level 1 (System Context) methodology skill - comprehensive guidance for identifying systems, actors, boundaries, and high-level relationships in software architectures. Refactored with progressive disclosure (562 lines core + 5 supporting files totaling 1,543 lines)

plugins.name: c4model-c2
plugins.description: C4 Model Level 2 (Container) methodology skill for identifying deployable units, technology stacks, and runtime environments within software systems - 2,318 lines of comprehensive documentation with 20+ technology detection patterns

plugins.name: c4model-c3
plugins.description: C4 Model Level 3 (Component) methodology skill - comprehensive guidance for identifying components, analyzing code structure, detecting design patterns, and mapping dependencies within containers

plugins.name: melly-core
plugins.description: Consolidated core workflow plugin - simplified explorer agent and init command following Claude Code best practices (Part of ongoing refactoring from 12+ plugins to 4 consolidated plugins)

plugins.name: c4model-observations
plugins.description: C4 Model observation documentation methodology for architectural findings across system, container, and component levels - 34 categories, evidence-based approach, 30+ examples

plugins.name: c4model-relations
plugins.description: C4 Model relation documentation methodology for dependencies and communications across system, container, and component levels - 48 relation types, protocol documentation, 45+ examples

plugins.name: melly-init
plugins.description: Initialize C4 model exploration - contains explorer agent, init command, validation scripts and templates

plugins.name: melly-c1
plugins.description: C1 System Context level - contains abstractor agent, command, methodology skill, validation scripts and templates

plugins.name: melly-c2
plugins.description: C2 Container level - contains abstractor agent, command, methodology skill, validation scripts and templates

plugins.name: melly-c3
plugins.description: C3 Component level - contains abstractor agent, command, methodology skill, validation scripts and templates

plugins.name: melly-doc
plugins.description: C4 documentation generation - contains writer agent, doc command, methodology skills (observations/relations), markdown validation and templates

plugins.name: melly-draw
plugins.description: C4 diagram visualization - contains drawer agent and draw command for Mermaid diagrams and Obsidian canvas
